backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features with related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting up root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping them with FoodPostsProvider.
frontend/src/components/add-food/forms/A: Single-page card form allowing users to submit a food donation with validation and navigation to the NGO Alert page.
Drawer-based food submission form opened from a button, validating input and navigating to the NGO Alert page.
Twoâ€‘step wizard form for adding food donations with basic validation and navigation to the NGO Alert page.
frontend/src/components/add-food/useAddF: Validation hook checking required food form fields and storing error messages.
Top-level layout wrapper with header, main content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with Home and History buttons, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed yet.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom eco-themed color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AddFoodPage.tsx: Displays tabbed interfaces for adding food via card, wizard, or drawer forms.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows previously added food posts from local state, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen with an Add Food button and a placeholder map of nearby NGOs.
frontend/src/pages/NgoAlertPage.tsx: Displays an NGO alert with recent donation info, a route map, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/TrackPage.tsx: Shows tracking details for the most recent food post, including donation info and status steps.
frontend/src/state/FoodPostsProvider.tsx: Ensures Zustand food post storage is rehydrated on app load.
frontend/src/state/foodPostsStore.ts: Zustand store for food posts with persistence, hydration state, and helper methods.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, containers, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata including schema version, issues, and existing feature definitions for the Food Wastage UI.
